Help:Node.title: Speak
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: Speak
Important Commands: @speak, @speak [LANGUAGE]
People talk in different ways. The IronClaw Online system models this. When you turn on a language the StoryBuilder Server automatically adjusts your speech to use words more appropriate for the accent that you've chosen.
For example, the IronClaw Online Noble language sounds like Old English: "you" becomes "thou"; "your" becomes "thy"; and "has" becomes "hath".
The "@speak" command is used to turn languages on and off.
See Also: , ,
